select * from (select distinct ta.subcontract_id, ta.bz, decode(ta.subcontract_type,'04',tc.party_id,ta.party_id)as party_id, decode(ta.subcontract_type,'04',tc.party_name,tb.party_name)as party_name, ta.subcontract_num, decode(ta.if_top_subcon,'1',ta.zgbjxe,decode(ta.subcontract_type,'03',ta.bzjje,ta.subcontract_amt))as subcontract_amt, decode(ta.subcontract_type,'01','抵押','02','质押','03','保证金','04','保证','')as subcontract_type_name, ta.subcontract_type, ta.if_top_subcon, ta.user_num, ta.org_num, to_char(ta.begin_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as begin_date, to_char(ta.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date from tb_con_subcontract ta left join tb_csm_party tb on ta.party_id=tb.party_id left join ( select listagg(tx.party_name,',') within group(order by party_name) as party_name, listagg(tx.party_id,',') within group(order by party_name) as party_id, ty.subcontract_id from tb_grt_guarantee_basic tz,tb_con_sub_grt_rel ty,tb_csm_party tx where tz.surety_id=ty.surety_id and tz.party_id=tx.party_id and (ty.grt_status !='04' or ty.grt_status is null) group by ty.subcontract_id ) tc on ta.subcontract_id=tc.subcontract_id where ta.subcontract_status='03'
)r where 1=1
